alert.note: Alert for Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutherford County through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Gust front winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smyrna, Walterhill, Christiana, Rockvale, Fosterville and Lascassas. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 72 and 88. Interstate 840 between mile markers 48 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
